net.trajano.batik

Class RasterizerMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • net.trajano.batik.RasterizerMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="rasterizer",
      defaultPhase=GENERATE_RESOURCES,
      threadSafe=true,
      requiresOnline=false)
public class RasterizerMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Executes the Batik rasterizer.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ResourceBundle bundle
      Resource bundle.

      Default SVG resources.
      private File destDir
      The directory to write the rasterized SVG files.
      private boolean failOnError
      Fail on error.
      private float height
      In less than or equal to zero, the height is not constrained on the output image.
      private float maxHeight
      If less than or equal to zero, the maximum height does not have any effect on the output image.
      private float maxWidth
      If less than or equal to zero, the maximum width does not have any effect on the output image.

      The MIME type of file to convert to.

      A list of SVG resources to import.
      private float width
      In less than or equal to zero, the width is not constrained on the output image.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_SVG_RESOURCES

        private static final List<org.apache.maven.model.Resource> DEFAULT_SVG_RESOURCES
        Default SVG resources.

      • bundle

        private final ResourceBundle bundle
        Resource bundle.

      • destDir

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${project.build.directory}/generated-resources/batik",
           required=true)
private File destDir
        The directory to write the rasterized SVG files.

      • failOnError

        @Parameter(defaultValue="true")
private boolean failOnError
        Fail on error. Otherwise it will continue to the next file.

      • height

        @Parameter(defaultValue="-1")
private float height
        In less than or equal to zero, the height is not constrained on the output image.

      • maxHeight

        @Parameter(defaultValue="-1")
private float maxHeight
        If less than or equal to zero, the maximum height does not have any effect on the output image.

      • maxWidth

        @Parameter(defaultValue="-1")
private float maxWidth
        If less than or equal to zero, the maximum width does not have any effect on the output image.

      • mimeType

        @Parameter(defaultValue="image/png",
           required=true)
private String mimeType
        The MIME type of file to convert to. Valid values are image/png, image/jpeg, image/tiff and application/pdf.

      • svgResources

        @Parameter(required=false)
private List<org.apache.maven.model.Resource> svgResources
        A list of SVG resources to import. Resource is used instead of FileSet to allow for filtering in the future. The default is: 
         <svgResources>
     <resource>
         <directory>${basedir}/src/main/svg</directory>
         <filtering>false</filtering>
         <includes>
             <include>**\/\*.svg</include>
         </includes>
         <excludes>
         </excludes>
     </resources>
 </svgResources>

      • width

        @Parameter(defaultValue="-1")
private float width
        In less than or equal to zero, the width is not constrained on the output image.
